attributes.action: Please help I am a victim of fraud UK.
attributes.additional_details:
I have been contacted by a law firm in England that is. Work visa. Workpermit and ready for the next hotel to my friends so they can apply to send money to the lawyer. A lot of money pound 16,574.33 (814,812.46 baht, Thai), but did not get a visa. And workpermit. Together, they have stopped us. I get a refund from them.

Now I need help to go back to the bank. Because they're going to the house and land.

rejection.details: Thank you for submitting this e-petition. The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy, not about individual cases. Please contact your local law enforcement agency about your situation.
